Package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.modal

Class ModalServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.base.AbstractComponentService<ModalComponentType,Modal>
io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.modal.ModalServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ModalService
public class ModalServiceImpl extends AbstractComponentService<ModalComponentType,Modal> implements ModalService
Implementation of the ModalService interface, providing functionality to check if modals are open, click modal buttons, retrieve textual content, and close modals. Extends AbstractComponentService to handle creation and retrieval of Modal instances.

This class uses ModalComponentType to identify modals in a UI automation framework, ensuring consistent interactions via containers and direct locators.

Method implementations delegate to an internally retrieved Modal object for each specified component type.

All public methods align with the contract defined by ModalService, ensuring compatibility and standardization across different modal implementations.

Author:
